text: I attempted to hang myself todayI wrapped a scarf around my neck and hung myself in my closet  that was until I woke up on the floor convulsing  I must ve blacked out and the scarf came undone from the closet   I remember waking up without realizing that I was awake  I felt nauseous with a headache and in panic  I was having flashbacks to everything that was causing me to commit suicide  I remember thinking  oh it s just a movie I m so glad that s not my life  but then as I continuied to gain consciousness I realized that it was real and that it was MY life   I lost it at that point and was yelling crying  why   I was so close   nooooooo  And getting really angry I had no remorse and was mad that I wasn t able to complete my mission It the evening now and I still have no regrets over what I did  Believe it or not I was at piece with myself during that initial blackout and was probably the happiest I d been in a long time My neck is sore and I have a red ring around my neck  I have a headache and some bruising on my body as I think I might have hit something on my way down I m gonna try again tmr with a belt and see if that works
summary: I tried to hang myself today. I woke up convulsing on the floor and the scarf came undone from the closet. My neck is sore and I have a red ring around my neck. I'm going to try again tomorrow with a belt.
cleaned: try hang today wake convulse floor scarf came closet neck sore red ring neck go try tomorrow belt

text: Merit  experience  and qualifications should be the ONLY things to be considered when aiming to fill a job position  There is nothing worse than being denied a job based on who you are  Minorities are denied jobs in certain workplaces  with positions being given to majorities with lesser qualifications and no more redeeming qualities  The same can be said the other way round  being that workplaces should not aim to hire minorities just for the sake of them being a minority so it looks good for the company  I was denied a summer job at a fast food place in December because they already had enough guys and were looking to hire some girls  No matter what  employers should just look at qualifications  and that is that

text: I feel hopeless Since last year I ve had so many suicidal thoughts floating around in my head  I ve always kept it bottled up making dark i wanna die jokes every now and then to release it a bit  But it s been getting to me now I really can t go a day without thinking that I wanna die  Like what s the point I m in chronic neck and back pain due to my scoliosis  I m an awkward and anxious shit who can t make conversations with anyone  I can t even get a Part time job how am I going to get a job in the career I want  I m a mediocre student  I feel both angry and helpless  I don t really see the point of anything now  I m still trying to go with the flow and plan for the potential future I might have  I definitely know im not going to attempt anything but the thoughts are there and most likely will always be there and I can t stand them or bottle them up as well as I used to before  In a way I m a bit scared that one day theses feelings will hit and out of impulse I ll try something  I don t want to tell my therapist about it honestly  The last therapist I told this too had me put inpatient for   weeks  I honestly don t even have any hope to get better i wish i could just end it
summary: Since last year I've had many suicidal thoughts in my head. I'm in chronic neck and back pain due to scoliosis and I can't get a part time job. I feel both angry and helpless. I don't want to tell my therapist about it as the last therapist put him in hospital for weeks.
cleaned: year suicidal thought head chronic neck pain scoliosis not time job feel angry helpless not want tell therapist therapist hospital week
